intro: Anastraphia calcicola, commonly known as the calcicola starflower, is a perennial flowering plant native to the arid regions of western North America. Anastraphia calcicola plays a role in stabilizing soils in its native habitat and is of interest to botanists studying xerophytic adaptations.
